Workflow.Name: Set Meeting Status to State Code
Workflow.Description: When Statecode = Completed, set Meeting Status & Meeting Status Header fields, to Completed. The StateCode (Status) is changed Completed when the Mark Complete button is clicked on a Meeting form.

LocalizedName.description: Set Meeting Status to State Code

Description.description: When Statecode = Completed, set Meeting Status & Meeting Status Header fields, to Completed. The StateCode (Status) is changed Completed when the Mark Complete button is clicked on a Meeting form.
